thread.title: Element Fleet Appoints Regional VP of Business Development
thread.title_full: Element Fleet Appoints Regional VP of Business Development

title: Element Fleet Appoints Regional VP of Business Development
text:
Element Fleet Appoints Regional VP of Business Development August 07, 2015, 07:12 AM Related: Element Financial , Fleet Financing , Trucking 
Element Fleet Management announced the appointment of Trish Marks to Regional Vice President of Business Development.“The expertise Trish offers customers is a testament to her 33 years of service in the fleet industry,” said Gary Anderson, chief business development officer for Element Fleet. “Her breadth and depth of the business provides customers with unparalleled solutions needed for their fleets and their respective businesses.”In her tenure with Element Fleet, Marks’ has held multiple positions. Transitioning from sales to an account executive role on the business development team in 2012, she has increased complex accounts, maintained client retention, and has been a contributing factor on sales wins for Element. Today's Other News
